doc:
Dom DeLuise https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dom_DeLuise 0 Dominick DeLuise (August 1, 1933 – May 4, 2009) was an American actor, voice actor, comedian, chef and author. He was the husband of actress Carol Arthur and the father of actor, director, pianist, and writer Peter DeLuise, and actors David DeLuise and Michael DeLuise. He starred in a number of movies directed by Mel Brooks, in a series of films with career-long best friend Burt Reynolds, and as a voice actor in various animated films by Don Bluth. Dominick_DeLuise ( August_1_,_1933 – May_4_,_2009 ) was an_American_actor , voice_actor , comedian , chef_and_author . He was the_husband of actress_Carol_Arthur and the_father of actor , director , pianist , and writer_Peter_DeLuise , and actors_David_DeLuise_and_Michael_DeLuise . He starred in a_number of movies directed by Mel_Brooks , in a_series of films with career-long_best_friend_Burt_Reynolds , and as a_voice_actor in various_animated_films by Don_Bluth .
